positive_examples: This is an example of hydrochloric acid.
The hydrochloric acid demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed hydrochloric acid in this context.
A typical case of hydrochloric acid would involve these features.
The concept of hydrochloric acid applies here.
A strong, highly corrosive inorganic acid commonly used in industrial processes and laboratory applications.
negative_examples: This is an example of sulfuric acid, not hydrochloric acid.
This represents chemical acid in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SulfuricAcid, or other types of ChemicalAcid

definition: A strong corrosive acid (HCl) found in gastric juice and used industrially.
